tools.name: search_flights
tools.description: Search for flights based on parameters.

max_connections.description: Maximum number of connections (0 for non-stop)
max_connections.title: Max Connections

tools.name: get_offer_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific flight offer.

OfferDetails.description: Model for getting detailed offer information.

offer_id.description: The ID of the offer to get details for
offer_id.title: Offer Id

OfferDetails.title: OfferDetails

FlightSegment.description: Model for a single flight segment in a multi-city trip.
FlightSegment.title: FlightSegment

max_connections.description: Maximum number of connections (0 for non-stop)
max_connections.title: Max Connections
